alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Northern Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southeastern Aroostook and east central Penobscot Counties... At 230 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Island Falls to near Sherman Station...and moving south AT 25 MPH. Locations impacted include... Sherman, Island Falls, Haynesville, Sherman Station, Wytopitlock, Reed Plantation, Lee, Oakfield, Mattawamkeag, Winn, Stacyville, Crystal, Woodville, Weston, Prentiss, Dyer Brook, Kingman, Reed, Orient and Macwahoc. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 255 and 276, and between mile markers 278 and 284. State Highway 11 between Sherman and Sherman Station. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Travel is not advised during these heavy snow showers. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow showers pass your location. If traveling pull off to a safe location.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Northern Penobscot; Southeast Aroostook
